short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record your expedition wins and picks!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to track your Legends of Runeterra expedition runs, and share them with the world? RuneTiera's Expedition Tracker will help you record your game runs, so that they can be saved and shared with other players. Your final deck lists, pick history, game results, and trade picks are all saved for future reference!
